## RecursiveReadonly type


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RecursiveReadonly<T> = T extends (...args: any[]) => any ? T : T extends any[] ? RecursiveReadonlyArray<T[number]> : T extends object ? Readonly<{
```
